name: The planet Zombotron
description: The planet Zombotron is full of rich resources. The Earth Command sent the captain of the Star Division "Voda7" and his ship to study the mysterious planet and secure a foothold on it. But the Zombotron hid a terrifying secret, namely a huge horde of monsters that go out on a hungry hunt at night. What will the captain do? Will he stay and survive the impending crisis, or will he escape after losing a dozen soldiers and his military rank?
